languages.text: "Завет не вечен". {n}Голос Кибеллы звучит негромко, едва слышно за плеском воды.{/n} "Смерть — конец всему, и даже моя стезя не способна избежать этой участи. Время пришло".

traits.locale_text: "Оставив Анн'Шини, мы спустимся в эти воды и очистим тела и души наши от праха ушедшего". {n}Голос Кибеллы звучит негромко, едва слышно за плеском у ваших ног.{/n} "Смерть — конец всему, и даже моя стезя не способна избежать этой участи. Время пришло".

languages.text: "The Tenets are impermanent." {n}Kibellah's voice is barely louder than the water.{/n} "Death is the end of all, and even they cannot avoid that end. Their time has come."
languages.original_text: "Завет не вечен". {n}Голос Кибеллы звучит негромко, едва слышно за плеском воды.{/n} "Смерть — конец всему, и даже моя стезя не способна избежать этой участи. Время пришло".

traits.locale_text: "Ahn'shini is impermanent." {n}Kibellah's voice is barely louder than the water.{/n} "Death is the end of all, and even the Way cannot avoid the end. Its time has come."

"The Tenets are impermanent." {n}Kibellah's voice is barely louder than the water.{/n} "Death is the end of all, and even they cannot avoid that end. Their time has come."
"The Tenets are impermanent." {n}Kibellah's voice is barely louder than the water.{/n} "Death is the end of all, and even they cannot avoid that end. Their time has come."

languages.text: «La Doctrina es atemporal». {n}La voz de Kibellah es tan queda que apenas se oye sobre el sonido del agua.{/n} «La muerte es el final de todas las cosas, y ni siquiera ella puede evitarlo. Ha llegado su momento».
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are impermanent." {n}Kibellah's voice is barely louder than the water.{/n} "Death is the end of all, and even they cannot avoid that end. Their time has come."

traits.locale_text: «La Doctrina es atemporal». {n}La voz de Kibellah es tan queda que apenas se oye sobre el sonido del agua.{/n} «La muerte es el final de todas las cosas, y ni siquiera ella puede evitarlo. Ha llegado su momento».

languages.text: 「教義は無常よ」{n}キベラの声は、水音よりわずかに大きかった。{/n}「死はすべての終わりであり、彼らでさえもその終わりを逃れることはできない。そして、その時が来た」
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are impermanent." {n}Kibellah's voice is barely louder than the water.{/n} "Death is the end of all, and even they cannot avoid that end. Their time has come."

traits.locale_text: 「教義は無常よ」{n}キベラの声は、水音よりわずかに大きかった。{/n}「死はすべての終わりであり、彼らでさえもその終わりを逃れることはできない。そして、その時が来た」

languages.text: “织血罗网的教义反复无常。”{n}绮贝菈的声音只比水声大一点点。{/n}“死亡是一切的终结，就连教义也无法避免这样的结局。它的时刻已然到来。”
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are impermanent." {n}Kibellah's voice is barely louder than the water.{/n} "Death is the end of all, and even they cannot avoid that end. Their time has come."

traits.locale_text: “织血罗网的教义反复无常。”{n}绮贝菈的声音只比水声大一点点。{/n}“死亡是一切的终结，就连教义也无法避免这样的结局。它的时刻已然到来。”

languages.text: "Die Grundsätze sind nicht von Dauer." {n}Kibellahs Stimme ist kaum lauter als das Wasser.{/n} "Der Tod ist das Ende von allem, und das können selbst sie nicht verhindern. Ihre Zeit ist gekommen."
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are impermanent." {n}Kibellah's voice is barely louder than the water.{/n} "Death is the end of all, and even they cannot avoid that end. Their time has come."

traits.locale_text: "Die Grundsätze sind nicht von Dauer." {n}Kibellahs Stimme ist kaum lauter als das Wasser.{/n} "Der Tod ist das Ende von allem, und das können selbst sie nicht verhindern. Ihre Zeit ist gekommen."

languages.text: « Les Préceptes sont éphémères, {n}dit Kibellah d'une voix à peine plus forte que le bruit de l'eau.{/n} La mort est la seule issue, une issue que la voie elle-même ne peut nous éviter. Son heure est venue. »
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are impermanent." {n}Kibellah's voice is barely louder than the water.{/n} "Death is the end of all, and even they cannot avoid that end. Their time has come."

traits.locale_text: « Les Préceptes sont éphémères, {n}dit Kibellah d'une voix à peine plus forte que le bruit de l'eau.{/n} La mort est la seule issue, une issue que la voie elle-même ne peut nous éviter. Son heure est venue. »

languages.original_text: "The Tenets are impermanent." {n}Kibellah's voice is barely louder than the water.{/n} "Death is the end of all, and even they cannot avoid that end. Their time has come."

languages.text: "İlkeler değişkendir." {n}Kibellah'nın sesi, su sesini güç bela bastırabiliyor.{/n} "Her biri ölümde son bulur. İlkeler bile bu sondan kaçamaz. Hepsinin vakti doldu."
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are impermanent." {n}Kibellah's voice is barely louder than the water.{/n} "Death is the end of all, and even they cannot avoid that end. Their time has come."
